meanings.definition: The branch of biology that deals with the effects of low temperatures on living organisms.
meanings.sent1: Cryobiology helps scientists understand how cold temperatures affect living things.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in cryobiology study how freezing impacts different organisms.
meanings.sent3: The penguin joked that he was a cryobiology expert because he loved the cold.
meanings.sent4: In the icy world of cryobiology, cells are like tiny ice sculptures waiting to be thawed.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on cryobiology made the concept of freezing biology come alive.

meanings.definition: The study of the effects of freezing and low temperatures on biological systems.
meanings.sent1: Understanding cryobiology is crucial for preserving organs for transplants.
meanings.sent2: Cryobiology research aims to improve techniques for storing biological samples at low temperatures.
meanings.sent3: The cryobiology lab was so cold that the researchers joked about becoming frozen specimens.
meanings.sent4: In the world of cryobiology, cells are like delicate ice sculptures waiting to be observed.
meanings.sent5: The vivid images in the cryobiology presentation made the audience appreciate the impact of freezing on life.
